description: This Java source file defines the class LegacyPingMessageEvent, which extends LegacyApsAckedCommandEvent. It models an event related to a legacy ping message in a ZigBee-like environment, providing methods to encode specific data into Base64 format.

classes.name: LegacyPingMessageEvent
classes.description: Represents a legacy ping message event with specific attributes and encoding capabilities.

methods.name: LegacyPingMessageEvent
methods.description: Constructor initializing the event with EUI64, endpoint, device number, RSSI, and LQI.

methods.name: getEncodedBuf
methods.description: Overrides method to encode the device number into Base64 string.
